title: @Riot. Why cant I redeem my RP?
body: So i just opened my presents for Christmas and I was going to redeem my RP. But for 5 minutes I watched the loading bar go around forever. Anyone else having this problem? Riot, plz write back. :)

replies.body:
We're working on this issue currently. Sorry about the delay guys!

For status updates you can visit this nifty page:
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/
Once the traffic flow stops and we are able to redeem our cards, will there be a problem with codes? For instance, will the system think our codes have already been used?

~~From what I've seen so far, that should not happen. :)~~

I stand corrected. It has happened to a few players, and we're helping them individually via requests made through Riot Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Sorry about the trouble!
When I try to redeem, it either says that it has already been redeemed or that i've reached the maximum amount of code redemption. Yet I haven't received my RP yet. Please help!
I adjusted the antennae on your account's RP receiver, and it looks like the transmission was now successful. Check your RP balance just to be sure. :)
Thank you so much TheFlash!

I think when people try multiple times to claim the RP, and it gets stuck, this can happen. I was able to put both of mine through, but a family member had only 1 of his work -- the other one now says the code has already been redeemed, but it doesn't show up in his RP Purchase history. Only the first card does. He doesn't have the RP either. He put in a support ticket, but just fyi, I recommend if anyone hasn't tried to redeem, that they wait a few days for the queue to clear so they don't ruin the card.

Please extend my apologies to your friend! 
We're working through the support requests and will get things sorted out for him, if we haven't already.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TheFlash,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=yENb4jxe,comment-id=002b0000000000010000,timestamp=2014-12-26T19:27:31.805+0000)
>
> Please extend my apologies to your friend! 
> We're working through the support requests and will get things sorted out for him, if we haven't already.

rito pls help mee its been 20 hrs
please FLash Help me!! i made a tick for my 50 $ rp card and and iv been waiting for about 10 hours now i made a new tick with alot more detail :(( plz hlep me !!

Same thing is happening to me, I had 3 cards, the first I redeemed with no problem, then the next one redeemed while still in the "redeeming" process, and the last one says its invalid. I tried all 3 over again and they all turned up invalid. I was supposed to get 21,600 riot points from all 3 cards when I only got 14,400. Is this 50 bucks down the drain? rito pls.

Hey there Joe. Took a peek at your attempts, and it looks like all the attempts you made at redeeming the third code had spaces. Next time you'll want to give it a try without the spaces between the numbers. Since there was only one code left, I manually redeemed it to your account to make it easier for you.

Sorry about the confusion! :)
Could you manually redeem mine as well?
It happened to me already. This was the only present I got and its now saying its invalid .-.

Hey dude, just looked up your redemption attempts. Make sure to type in the code without any spaces next time. If you still have trouble, write in a request to us here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Thank you so much!

Hi TheFlash,

Letting you know I submitted a ticket about this issue on the support site.
Same happening here. I'm still "Redeeming" at this very moment.
It's Christmas, there is going to be a HUGE influx of RP prepaid cards, just be patient.

Me, too. I redeemed one card already, but the second card is still redeeming...

EDIT: Hold on, is anyone elses chat service still logging on as well?
WHATS IS GOING ON RIOT PLS
yep
{{champion:32}} never seen anything have a problem with me giving it money before today {{item:3070}}
mine says some thing like "the store cant process your request. please try again in a few minutes." theni tried again after each game i played and it still doesnt work
Im having the same problem, i cant redeem a single card
RITO BE THE HERO THIS FORUM NEEDS, GIVE US OUR RP
Having the same problem... Please rito I'm just trying to give you moneyyy D:
Well my RP purchase finally went through after 7 hours, thank the dear lord Rito :)

Thank goodness i thought i was the only one. Still slightly upset by the problem, but relieved that i'm not alone. hopefully it is fixed by the end of the day! id like to start stockpiling Snowdown skins :)

Same here. Can't get the RP to go and it's been stuck on "Redeeming..." for a few minutes now. 

I typed it with and without spaces.

**Okay, I'm 2 years late but whatever.. So I have a problem with ''Please try again in a couple of minutes if you see this multiple times contact support ...''. My brother bought it in Germany cus we don't have it here in my country (Serbia) and I've tried waiting and stuff still wont work .. I hope you can kinda help me? I did sumbit a ticket to support and still waiting for respond. So if you say it won't work my brother is gonna be pissed.. Because he kinda threw 10$ away (And in this situation money is very sensitive thing because of the crisis..) I hope I can activate it soon.. Still hoping I'm not too late for this post :/ **
I just kept retrying the code throughout yesterday, but when i did the same thing last night mine said it has already been redeemed

i want leblanc plzzzzzzz riot gift me her plzzzzz
{{champion:7}}  i want her sooo bad

OK this happened to me but now its saying i used them.  I redeemed one card already, and my second one is invalid.i did not use one and it says its invalid
Riot PLS
Rito plz

I had a similar issue when I was gifted some RP cards from Game Stop. I figured out that the cards they got me were a different type of card and instead of going to "Codes" section of the store, you need to go to the Purchase RP section and select "Pre-Paid Cards" 

I hope this helps. Merry Christmas!
i did do this... Thank you though!
I redeemed my cards finally...Thank you Riot for actually responding to this.
I am having the issues reported above. I have gotten one card through but I'm worried the other card my say that the code has already been used or something. Is that something we should look out for?
same thing is happening to me ....

i'm not even getting  a loading bar i'm straight getting errors, i've been trying for almost 10 hours now, is this seriously happening? this is christmas #4 now? uh...when do you start taking notes and applying what you've learned?

I wish Riot would actually give us updates on the status of this annoying problem, instead of just saying "we're investigating". I wonder if there was anything they could have done to prepare for this. No one can say that they didn't know that a lot of people would be trying to redeem RP, but this is what we get. This is almost as bad as the 4.20 update. Well at least the servers haven't gone down.
My League card is not working it was for 10$ still nothing
I got two cards and i redeemed one then when i tried to redeem the other it wouldnt work waited like 10 minutes so idk whats up probably servers.
Can riot fix this fast i got RP as a pressent from christmas and i want the sale skins before they run out. can riot pls pay attention to this!
Yes please  help I have the same problem:( :( :( :( :( :(  :( :( :({{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Okay, I'm extremely happy that I'm not the only one. For all that got one card, you are super lucky
It's been happening to me too, I'm just going to stop redeeming and wait until tomorrow when things are clearer, I think it's traffic because of over 10k people trying to redeem at once
